abstract: As blogs continue to debate whether Google might be considering a deal for Twitter, analysts at Sanford C. Bernstein are making their views on the subject unmistakably clear.
lead_paragraph: As blogs continue to debate whether Google might be considering a deal for Twitter, analysts at Sanford C. Bernstein are making their views on the subject unmistakably clear.

headline.main: Google and the Temptations of Being Cash-Rich
